review: Situated on the main road near Post Office Gandhi Chowk. Rooms are small but clean. View from room is amazing. Staff members are courteous and helpful. Food quality is also good. Staying here was amazing experience. Recommend to everyone who visits this town.
name: Pradeep A

review: The nearest airport to the hotel is Jolly Grand Airport.Rooms of the property are equipped with basic amenities like comfortable bedding, television,clean linen,hot and cold water and essential bathroom toiletries.Room service is available for 24 hours.
name: ak10aish

review: Its the first time we booked a hotel instantly and we were fooled. The owner charged double the price and facility were very poor. there were spider webs behind the curtains. there was stinking drain facing the window. We requested for white bedsheet and clean quilt but could not get it.   We asked for housekeeping to clean the room but the owner every time made excuses and we had to stay in the dirty room for two nights. A hell of experience
name: sapna a

review: The hotel galaxy is a neat and decent hotel at a very good location in the heart of the city. The staff is nicely behaved. Food quality is good.I have stayed in hotel from 15.04.2016 to 17.04.2016.It was a great experience.
name: rakesh65
